Title: VCS EP Insights Packs
Description / Usage: Insights packs and reports from various members of the partnership, as well as historical pulse survey reports.

Title: Doctors of the world 12-month vaccine programme
FareShare Dashboard
Description / Usage: FareShare provide a range of data on their activities, including tonnage of food distributed by month, region, type, supplier.
Link: Link should not be made available outside of insights team

Title: Vaccine Hesitancy Map
Description / Usage: Map shows vaccine hesitancy. This captures how willing people are to take a COVID-19 vaccine. This is shown as a vaccine willingness score out of five (with five being the most unwilling)

Title: Covid Age Calculator
Description / Usage: Calculates indicative Covid-age for adults aged 20-75. Estimates are derived from published research in populations with no previous infection by, or vaccination against, SARS-CoV-2.

Title: Covid Dashboard
Description / Usage: Pulls together open data to support funders around covid-19

Title: International Disaster Response Dashboard
Description / Usage: IFRC GO aims to make all disaster information universally accessible and useful to IFRC responders for better decision making. Includes stats on active DREF operations, funding requirements and active emergency appeals

Title: Zoe App
Description / Usage: Web page updates every day, based on the information from millions of users of the COVID Symptom Study app, the largest community monitoring of COVID in the world.

Title: Lockdown Dashboard
Description / Usage: Find sites to use for COVID-19 mobile testing, including car parks and hospitals in or near highly vulnerable areas.

Title: Local Assets Map
Description / Usage: Pinpoints local assets to support with operational response to emergencies, including locations of Local Infrastructure Organisations, Care Homes, Food Banks etc.

Title: London Community Response Survey
Description / Usage: Results of a weekly questionnaire sent to a cohort of frontline civil society organisations from April 2020. The results are being used alongside a range of other pieces of intelligence to inform the pan-London response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Title: Local ethnic inequalities and dynamics of diversity
Organisation: Centre on the Dynamics of Ethnicity
Description / Usage: Series of census briefings for each of the case study site locations and commissioned census briefings for selected local authorities.

Title: CHLDRN
Description / Usage: Childhood Local Data on Risks and Needs (CHLDRN) provides the most complete picture of the numbers of children at risk in England, at both a national and local level.

Title: Index of Multiple Deprivation
Description / Usage: A street level visualisation of the Indices of Multiple Deprivation from the Office for National Statistics

Title: London COVID-19 Resilience Dashboard
Description / Usage: Outcome data to monitor the impact of Covid-19 on the lives of Londoners. Dashboard is structured around the 5 outcomes agreed by London’s Recovery Board

Title: Mass Testing Volunteers for Schools
Description / Usage: Find mass testing volunteers based on the name of either a primary or secondary school.

Title: Voluntary Sector Impact Berometer
Description / Usage: This project examines COVID-19 impact on voluntary, community and social enterprise (VCSE) organisations. In particular, it focuses on providing real-time data about how the pandemic is impacting voluntary organisations working-practices and operations, their responses, learning and resilience.

Title: Talk London
Description / Usage: Method of community to raise concerns

Title: Coronavirus Dashboard
Description / Usage: The official UK government website for data and insights on coronavirus (COVID-19).
